name: Prismagic
description: Prismagic is a roguelite twin stick shooter game where you embark on a journey to save Moira's sisters corrupted by the shattered rainbow gem. In order to defeat her enemies Moira uses a special technique and fights the evil with color! Mix and match the colors of your bullets and hit the monsters with the corresponding color to defeat them! (Unfortunately, at the moment the game is only playable with a controller)
